step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you do this.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale and extend.
Keep up the good work with the arm movements. Ensure you are exhaling fully as you extend your arms.
Your arm extensions are looking good. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale during this step.
Great job completing the repetitions! Continue to focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale and extend your arms.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles when bringing your arms in, and exhale and relax as you extend them outwards.
